ValidationRule.description: validation rule to disallow the selection of the following values from Status standard field: "Draft", "In Approval Process".
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( Not($Setup.CEPSkipValidationRules__c.Contract__c ), OR( ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Draft'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Activated'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'In Approval Process') ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Valid values for Status are: Open, Completed
